response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it could significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its worth, I propose a special introductory offer of $1,200,000 for this product. This price not only represents a significant saving for you but also reflects my commitment to ensuring that such a valuable asset finds the right hands. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
